import React, { Component } from 'react' import {ListGroup, Button} from 'reactstrap'; import cats from '../cats' import {Link, Route, Switch, BrowserRouter as Router} from "react-router-dom" import CrazyCat from "./crazyCat.png" import CatIndex from './CatIndex' class CatShow extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { cats: cats } } render() { const {id} = this.props.match.params const cat = this.state.cats.find((v) => v.id === parseInt(id)) return ( <>



{cat.name}

Age: {cat.age}
Hobby: {cat.enjoys}
} /> }/> } /> ) } } export default CatShow
